comprehensive_overview: Optuna is an open-source hyperparameter optimization framework to automate hyperparameter search for machine learning algorithms. It can be used with any machine learning framework and optimizes a wide range of models effectively.
core_features: Efficient hyperparameter optimization algorithms such as TPE (Tree-structured Parzen Estimator) and CMA-ES (Covariance Matrix Adaptation Evolution Strategy). Easy integration with major machine learning frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, etc.Visualization tools for analyzing optimization results and study hyperparameter relationships.Support for distributed optimization for scaling hyperparameter search.Ability to define flexible search spaces for hyperparameters.
